Who I AM

I am a Data Analyst with a passion for coding and systems development as it applies practically to the business environment. My experience and education in finance provides me with a practical understanding on how data and systems underpin business intelligence, and how to approach problems in an analytical and practical applicable manner.

My Skills

Data Science

Data science at it's core comes down to informed decision making. Data anlytics and related tools are all aimed at extracting knowledge and insights from the different forms of structured and unstructured data. All my analytics projects are aimed at utilizing this data to gain business intelligence. My data analytics skills include:

UI/UX

We all know the importance of effective UI/UX design principals on websites and web applications. This is ultimately the contact point between you and your client/user. Effective UI/UX design can improve user experience and customer satisfaction and ultimately help increase the number of users. Though I am still a junior UI/UX dev, I feel confident in my CSS, Sass and HTML skills to build websites and web applications with a positive and cohesive user experience.

Web Dev & Coding

Junior Web Application Developer focused mainly on the development and deployment of active Management Information Systems. Development competencies focused on Java Script, Mongo DB, Express, REACT, Node.js & Next.js. I am also a pyhton developer with competencies in mySQL, Pandas, Numpy, Folium, Tkinter, video and image processing with OpenCV & data visualization with Bokeh.

Project Management

I have over 10-years of project management experience, successfully managing a wide variety of different projects amougst several different sectors. Project clients include national departments, provincial departments, SETAs, SOE's and private sector clients. I have a proven track record in project design & ideation, sourcing project funding from private and public sectors and implimentation.
